title: EP 305 J. Doyne Farmer on Complexity Economics

great example of chaos being weather

most complicated kind of attractor is

long as you keep the clock wound, it's
always going to go to that same motion.
And then chaotic attractors are more
interesting because
chaotic attractors go all over the place
